@graph.name: Lucy World – Isesengura ry'ishakisha mu Rwanda
@graph.description: Shakisha amakuru ya Google y'u Rwanda hamwe n'ibyifuzo, icyerekezo n'isesengura rya AI rikomeza imyanzuro y'ibirimo n'iterambere ry'ubucuruzi.
@graph.keywords: amagambo fatizo y'ikinyarwanda, SEO Rwanda, Google Trends, igipimo cy'ishakisha, isesengura rya AI, ingamba z'ibirimo byo mu gace
